chapters.title: Chapter 6: Surprises
chapters.info: Sheriam Bayanar, p. 99—Flame-haired Accepted with a room near Siuan's. She is slim, with tilted green eyes. She grew up in Saldaea. She is a very good cook, and likes baking. One of the biggest gossips among the Accepted, it is wise to keep a careful tongue around her. Despite this, Moiraine considers her a close friend and confidant. She sleeps like the dead.
